text: Les Stroud (born October 20, 1961) is a Canadian filmmaker, musician, writer, television actor, host, television director and producer, and survival expert who is known for his survival show Survivorman. He was raised in Toronto, Ontario. He studied at Mimico High School and at Fanshawe College. Stroud was married to Susan Jamison from 1994 until they divorced in 2008. They had two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian television actors Category:Writers from Toronto Category:Canadian television producers Category:Television directors Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Musicians from Toronto
title: Les Stroud
